list_definition.definition: the natural outer covering of an animal or person

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: She couldn’t stand the feel of wool against her skin

list_definition.definition: a thin outer layer, as on a fruit
a (thin) film or layer that forms on a liquid

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: Boiled milk often has a skin on it.
